main event: An oblong light appeared to be hovering at a low altitude near Gary, Indiana on October 3, 1960.
interesting points: The light was bluish-white in color and about the size of a basketball.
The light appeared to be moving slowly at a slight angle, and then suddenly disappeared.
The witness, an elderly lady, reported that the light appeared and disappeared several times during the observation period.
The case indicates a possible unexplained aerial object was observed.
The report states that the elderly witness reported the object was visible for a short period of time, and then suddenly disappeared, which warrants further investigation.
sighted object: an oblong bluish-white light, about the size of a basketball
